About FixICE.org

FixICE.org is a Burlington, MA–based grassroots organization and active member of the coalition of groups that protest at the ICE detention center in Burlington Mon-Sat. FixICE.org organizes the Monday and Tuesday groups.

Our mission is to empower people to take effective action to stop ICE cruelties, defend immigrant rights, and win elections that create lasting change.

We Make It Easier to Get Involved

Our website provides a curated list of organizations and websites so you can quickly find meaningful ways to act — whether that’s protesting, volunteering, advocating, learning, or strengthening your current involvement. We highlight established local groups that:

  • Meet regularly
  • Make participation accessible
  • Provide clear information
  • Have a track record of effective action

Our Strategy menu organizes resources by type of action: protest, volunteer, advocate, or learn — so you can choose what fits you.

Note: This site will be updated regularly with new resources and information. You don't have to keep checking every page—just visit Latest Updates for a log of all recent changes and additions.
